text.freecam.configScreen.title: Freecam Options
text.freecam.configScreen.option.flightM: The type of flight used by freecam.
text.freecam.configScreen.option.perspec: The initial perspective of the camera.
text.freecam.configScreen.collision.opti:
You can travel through glass blocks in freecam.
§cNOTE: Can only be used in singleplayer, creative, or with operator status.

You can travel through any door, trapdoor, or gate in freecam.
§cNOTE: Can only be used in singleplayer, creative, or with operator status.

You can travel through any block in freecam.
§eOverrides above settings.
§cNOTE: Can only be used in singleplayer, creative, or with operator status.
Whether §7Initial Perspective§r should check for collision, even when using §7Ignore All Collision§r.
text.freecam.configScreen.option.disable: Disables freecam when damage is received.
text.freecam.configScreen.option.allowIn:
Whether you can interact with blocks/entities in freecam.
§cNOTE: Can only be used in singleplayer, creative, or with operator status.
§c*Unless using interaction mode 'Player'
text.freecam.configScreen.option.freezeP:
Prevents player movement while freecam is active.
§cNOTE: Can only be used in singleplayer, creative, or with operator status.
text.freecam.configScreen.option.showPla: Shows your player in its original position.
text.freecam.configScreen.option.showHan: Whether you can see your hand in freecam.
text.freecam.configScreen.option.showSub: Whether you see a fog overlay underwater, in lava, or powdered snow.
text.freecam.configScreen.option.notifyT: Notifies you when entering/exiting tripod cameras.
